sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-alert
      border="left"
      close-text
      dismissible
      dark
      color="green accent-4"
      v-if="show"
    >
      Cập nhật thành công!
    </v-alert>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          <v-form
            ref="form"
            @submit.prevent="updateForm"
            class="pa-5"
            enctype="multipart/form-data"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="products.title"
              label="title"
              :rules="rules"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="products.category"
              label="category"
              :rules="rules"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field
              v-model="products.content"
              label="content"
              :rules="rules"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-file-input
              label="select image"
              @change="selectFile"
            ></v-file-input>
            <v-img :src="`/${products.image}`" width="100px"></v-img>
            <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">Cập nhật</v-btn>
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";
import API from "../api";
export default {
  name: "add-product",
  data() {
    return {
      rules: [(value) => !!value || "this field is requied"],
      products: {
        title: "",
        category: "",
        content: "",
        image: "",
      },
      image: "",
      show: false,
    };
  },
  async created() {
    const res = await API.getProductByID(this.$route.params.id);
    this.products = res;
  },
  methods: {
    selectFile(file) {
      this.image = file;
    },
    async updateForm() {
      const formData = new FormData();

      formData.append("image", this.image);
      formData.append("title", this.products.title);
      formData.append("category", this.products.category);
      formData.append("content", this.products.content);
      formData.append("old_image", this.products.image);
      console.log(this.products.image);
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        const res = await API.updateProduct(this.$route.params.id, formData);
        if (res) {
          this.show = true;
          this.$router.go()	
        }
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
